original_text:
Hot to Burn
Parafrasando un noto cattivo di una saga cinematografica e letteraria, le slot da bar sono il nostro presente, il nostro passato e il nostro futuro. Infatti sebbene il mercato videoludico di questo tipo si sia spostato nel tempo verso un approccio digitale e online, l’influenza che questo tipo di titoli ha avuto su di noi sembra non accennare a sparire.
Ecco quindi che troviamo slot online come Hot to Burn della Pragmatic Play che offrono uno stile molto simile ai cabinati che è possibile trovare in un bar e che rappresenta una chicca per coloro che provano una certa nostalgia a tal proposito.
Scopriamo quindi questa slot da un punto di vista tecnico e visivo.
Hot to burn – Grafica
Nel mondo delle slot non è detto che ambientazioni storiche, futuristiche o stravaganti debbano essere l’unico modo per attirare giocatori. Infatti Hot to Burn decide di rimanere fedele alle classiche slot da bar e lo fa anche nel suo aspetto grafico.
Hot to Burn si presenta come una slot essenziale e che vuole mettere in mostra il lato più tradizionale delle slot da bar. La griglia è talmente essenziale che non è nemmeno presente graficamente, infatti ci sono solamente i simboli che vedremo scorrere lungo i rulli e su un semplice sfondo di nero e fiamme.
I simboli sono, ovviamente, formati di frutta come prugne, ciliege, uva, angurie e tantissime altre, accompagnate da campane d’oro e il numero sette rosso come il fuoco che è l’elemento su cui si basa l’intero concept di Hot to burn.
Questa slot non sembra volersi porre come un esempio di originalità, ma fa bene il suo lavoro nel proporre un classico intramontabile delle slot e che è arrivato anche nel mondo online. Ma dopo aver analizzato il suo comparto grafico, è giunto il momento di vedere come se la cava dal punto di vista del gameplay.
Hot to Burn – Meccaniche di gioco
Anche se lo stile retrò richiama le slot di un tempo, la griglia di gioco riprende i canoni delle slot online, mostrando quindici simboli in ogni giocata grazie al suo meccanismo di tipo 5*3 (le vecchie slot avevano un 3*3 o addirittura un 3*1, per quelle più vecchie).
Per quanto riguarda i simboli speciali, anche in questo caso la slot si discosta dai canoni classici, offrendo ad esempio la stella, la quale è un simbolo Scatter che permette di accedere alla modalità bonus qualora ne trovassimo almeno tre in un’unica giocata.
La slot dimostra di avere una volatilità media con un RTP pari al 96.71% e non è raro vedere delle vincite interessanti durante le giocate normali (piuttosto che un gran numero di vincite minori).
Slot simili a Hot to Burn
Le slot online che riprendono i grandi classici da bar sono tantissime. Troppe per elencarle tutte, ma alcuni titoli spiccano più di altri come:  3 Fruits Win, Sevens & Fruit, Sizzling Hot  e Magic Fruit. Una menzione d’onore va a due slot molto originali che reinventano le slot da bar, ossia Joker Troupe e Fruits ‘n Royals.

raw_translation.response:
Hot to Burn
To paraphrase a famous villain from a cinematic and literary saga, bar slot machines are our present, our past, and our future. Indeed, although the video gaming market of this type has shifted towards a digital and online approach, the influence that this type of title has had on us seems to show no signs of disappearing. 
That's why we can find online slots like Hot to Burn by Pragmatic Play, which offer a style very similar to the cabinets that can be found in a bar, and represent a gem for those who feel a certain nostalgia for them. 
Let's discover this slot from a technical and visual point of view. 
Hot to Burn - Graphics
In the world of slots, it's not always necessary to have historical, futuristic, or extravagant environments be the only way to attract players. In fact, Hot to Burn decides to remain faithful to classic bar slots and does so even in its graphic appearance. 
Hot to Burn appears as an essential slot machine that wants to showcase the most traditional side of bar slots. The grid is so essential that it's not even present graphically, in fact, there are only the symbols that we will see scrolling along the reels and on a simple background of black and flames. 
The symbols are, of course, made up of fruits such as plums, cherries, grapes, watermelons, and many others, accompanied by golden bells and the number seven, red as fire, which is the element on which the entire Hot to Burn concept is based. 
This slot doesn't seem to want to position itself as an example of originality, but it does its job well in proposing a timeless classic of slots that has also arrived in the online world. But after analyzing its graphic component, it's time to see how it performs from a gameplay point of view. 
Hot to Burn - Game mechanics 
Although the retro style recalls slots of the past, the game grid follows the canons of online slots, showing fifteen symbols in each play thanks to its 5*3 type mechanism (old slots had a 3*3 or even a 3*1, for the oldest ones). 
As for the special symbols, in this case too the slot machine deviates from the classic canons, offering for example the star, which is a Scatter symbol that allows access to the bonus mode if we find at least three of them in a single play. 
The slot machine shows to have medium volatility with an RTP of 96.71%, and it's not uncommon to see interesting winnings during normal plays (rather than a large number of smaller winnings). 
Slots similar to Hot to Burn 
Online slots that take up the great classics from bars are countless. Too many to list them all, but some titles stand out more than others like 3 Fruits Win, Sevens & Fruit, Sizzling Hot, and Magic Fruit. Honorable mentions go to two very original slots that reinvent bar slots, namely Joker Troupe and Fruits 'n Royals.

response.headline: Hot to Burn - Gameplay mechanics
response.content: Hot to Burn follows the online slot game pattern and presents a 5x3 grid with 15 symbols on display. Although it maintains the classic theme, it offers modern features like the scatter symbol, which is the star icon. At least three Star symbols enable the players to access the bonus mode. The slot game offers medium volatility with an RTP of 96.71%, and players can expect a decent payout during the normal play sessions.

response.headline: Hot to Burn - Bonus features
response.content: Hot to Burn offers a decent range of bonus features that keeps the players engaged. The Scatter symbol - Star - allows the player to access the bonus mode where there is a possibility of greater winnings. The bonus mode makes the game more exciting by using the respin technique that allows the player to have more chances of increasing the winnings.

response.headline: Hot to Burn - Game design and graphics
response.content: Hot to Burn focuses on using classic bar slots as a theme, thus sticking to the essentials of slot gaming. The design is straightforward, with black and flaming background and symbols of fruits, golden bells, and number seven. The game doesn't aim to be original but makes sure to provide a nostalgic experience of the classic slots.

response.headline: Slots similar to Hot to Burn
response.content: Hot to Burn is just one of many classic bar slots that have adapted into online gaming. Some of the titles that have stood out due to their resemblance and popularity include 3 Fruits Win, Sevens & Fruit, Sizzling Hot, and Magic Fruit. But, two titles that offer a new spin on the theme worth mentioning are Joker Troupe and Fruits 'n Royals.

response.headline: Hot to Burn - Volatility and RTP
response.content: Hot to Burn presents medium volatility and an RTP of 96.71%. During normal spins, players can expect to earn significant payouts, but the game doesn't offer frequent small winnings. This element of the game adds to the excitement as players don't know when they will hit it big.

Hot to Burn appears as an essential slot machine that wants to showcase the most traditional side of bar slots. The grid is so essential that it's not even present graphically, in fact, there are only the symbols that we will see scrolling along the reels and on a simple background of black and flames. 
The symbols are, of course, made up of fruits such as plums, cherries, grapes, watermelons, and many others, accompanied by golden bells and the number seven, red as fire, which is the element on which the entire Hot to Burn concept is based. 
This slot doesn't seem to want to position itself as an example of originality, but it does its job well in proposing a timeless classic of slots that has also arrived in the online world. But after analyzing its graphic component, it's time to see how it performs from a gameplay point of view. 
Hot to Burn - Game mechanics 
Although the retro style recalls slots of the past, the game grid follows the canons of online slots, showing fifteen symbols in each play thanks to its 5*3 type mechanism (old slots had a 3*3 or even a 3*1, for the oldest ones). 
As for the special symbols, in this case too the slot machine deviates from the classic canons, offering for example the star, which is a Scatter symbol that allows access to the bonus mode if we find at least three of them in a single play. 
The slot machine shows to have medium volatility with an RTP of 96.71%, and it's not uncommon to see interesting winnings during normal plays (rather than a large number of smaller winnings).

Online slots that take up the great classics from bars are countless. Too many to list them all, but some titles stand out more than others like 3 Fruits Win, Sevens & Fruit, Sizzling Hot, and Magic Fruit. Honorable mentions go to two very original slots that reinvent bar slots, namely Joker Troupe and Fruits 'n Royals.

Review: Hot to Burn
To paraphrase a famous villain from a cinematic and literary saga, bar slot machines are our present, our past, and our future. Indeed, although the video gaming market of this type has shifted towards a digital and online approach, the influence that this type of title has had on us seems to show no signs of disappearing. 
That's why we can find online slots like Hot to Burn by Pragmatic Play, which offer a style very similar to the cabinets that can be found in a bar, and represent a gem for those who feel a certain nostalgia for them. 
Let's discover this slot from a technical and visual point of view. 
Hot to Burn - Graphics
In the world of slots, it's not always necessary to have historical, futuristic, or extravagant environments be the only way to attract players. In fact, Hot to Burn decides to remain faithful to classic bar slots and does so even in its graphic appearance. 
Hot to Burn appears as an essential slot machine that wants to showcase the most traditional side of bar slots. The grid is so essential that it's not even present graphically, in fact, there are only the symbols that we will see scrolling along the reels and on a simple background of black and flames. 
The symbols are, of course, made up of fruits such as plums, cherries, grapes, watermelons, and many others, accompanied by golden bells and the number seven, red as fire, which is the element on which the entire Hot to Burn concept is based. 
This slot doesn't seem to want to position itself as an example of originality, but it does its job well in proposing a timeless classic of slots that has also arrived in the online world. But after analyzing its graphic component, it's time to see how it performs from a gameplay point of view. 
Hot to Burn - Game mechanics 
Although the retro style recalls slots of the past, the game grid follows the canons of online slots, showing fifteen symbols in each play thanks to its 5*3 type mechanism (old slots had a 3*3 or even a 3*1, for the oldest ones). 
As for the special symbols, in this case too the slot machine deviates from the classic canons, offering for example the star, which is a Scatter symbol that allows access to the bonus mode if we find at least three of them in a single play. 
The slot machine shows to have medium volatility with an RTP of 96.71%, and it's not uncommon to see interesting winnings during normal plays (rather than a large number of smaller winnings). 
Slots similar to Hot to Burn 
Online slots that take up the great classics from bars are countless. Too many to list them all, but some titles stand out more than others like 3 Fruits Win, Sevens & Fruit, Sizzling Hot, and Magic Fruit. Honorable mentions go to two very original slots that reinvent bar slots, namely Joker Troupe and Fruits 'n Royals.
